MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL41 postcode area of Blaenau Ffestiniog, affecting properties in Trawsfynudd and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  8:50PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the repairs required to a fault on the overhead line network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:10AM on 24th February2021.
